title: Entrance lobbies in stilted portion, height not exceeding 7
clause_text: Entrance lobbies in stilted portion, height not exceeding 7.2 m. or height equivalent to two floor or height of stilt whichever is more. Open to sky swimming pool at the terrace above the top most storey or on the top most podium only.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Entrance lobbies in stilted portion, height not exceeding 7.2 m. or height equivalent to two floor or height of stilt whichever is more.
